live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38456.summary: Some customers in Selkirk are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38456.title: June 13 – Selkirk | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 1:00pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
38457.summary: Some customers in the King Edward area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38457.title: June 13 – Winnipeg (King Edward) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
